name.en: Rage Serpent of the Blaze Fiends
name.ja: <ruby>焔<rt>えん</rt></ruby><ruby>魔<rt>ま</rt></ruby>の<ruby>暴<rt>ぼう</rt></ruby><ruby>蛇<rt>じゃ</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: Your opponent has a face-up Level 7 or higher monster on their field and you have no other monsters on your field.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Level 10 Maximum Monster from your Graveyard to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, you can only attack with Maximum Monsters.
